pkgmetadata.longdescription: Push-to-Talk with libinput + Pulseaudio. This is not strictly push-to-talk, but it works as so in practice. The default status is muting all inputs, and un-muting them only when the key is pressed (after the KeyPress event, and before the KeyRelease event).

use.flag: Install policykit action to allow execution of script through policykit.
